sentences.en: A beam of high radiant power will have high divergence.
sentences.cn: 高辐射功率的光束会有高的发散度.

sentences.en: A minimal error or deviation may result in wide divergence.
Adjust any divergence from the established norms and inform Production Manager accordingly.
sentences.cn: 调整所有既定标准的歧义并相应地通知生产经理.

sentences.en: Any appreciable divergence from these values raises questions.
sentences.cn: 对这些数值有任何可检测到的偏差均说明有问题.

sentences.en: Auy divergence from such circumstances can be regarded as a state of imperfect information.
sentences.cn: 任何偏离这种情况都可视为信息不完全.

sentences.en: Convergence and divergence of infinite series depend upon this concept.
sentences.cn: 无穷级数的收敛性与发散性与此概念有关.

sentences.en: Darwin called this the principle of divergence.
sentences.cn: 达尔文把这个称为性状趋异原理.

sentences.en: In case of any divergence of interpretation, the Chinese text shall prevail.
sentences.cn: 若对其解释产生异议, 则以中文文本为准.

sentences.en: In case there is any divergence of interpretation of this agreement , the text shall prevail.
It arises because of the horizontal divergence.
sentences.cn: 它是由于水平辐散而出现的.

sentences.en: Some degree of divergence is inevitable, but more co - ordination is needed.
sentences.cn: 一些分歧不可避免, 但还需要更多的协调.

sentences.en: The motion divergence body resistivity, decreases the opportunity which is sick.
sentences.cn: 运动增强身体抵抗力, 减低患病的机会.

sentences.en: The tenor of the opening remarks reflects the divergence in the priorities of the two sides.
sentences.cn: 开场白的要旨反映了双方在何为当务之急上存在分歧。

sentences.en: There is a complementary divergence of views of the structure of amorphous polymers.
sentences.cn: 关于无定型聚合物结构有着互补的分歧意见.

sentences.en: There's a substantial divergence of opinion within the party.
This divergence generates most of the whipsaw in a price chart.
sentences.cn: 这种背离在图表上通常会产生锯齿.

words.tran_cn: 发散的；分歧的；岔开的（等于divergent）
分歧；分叉；意见不同；分支

phrases.tran_cn: 射束发散；光束发散度；电子束发散

trans.tran_cn: 分叉，分歧，背离，离题，分散；发散
trans.tran_en: A divergence is a difference between two or more things, attitudes, or opinions
